mapper.select: SELECT MID, PASS, NAME, PHONE, 'ROLE_' || upper(RESPONSIBILITY) RESPONSIBILITY FROM MEMBER WHERE MID = #{mid}

SELECT m.member_no, m.email, m.nickname, m.profile_image, m.topic_hashtag, m.accum_activity_point, m.available_activity_point, m.aco_point, m.member_level, c.sub_code_name, e.emo_name, e.emo_buydate FROM member m JOIN my_emoticon e ON m.member_no = e.member_no JOIN sub_code_tbl c ON c.sub_code = m.member_level WHERE m.member_no = #{memberNo} ORDER BY e.emo_buydate desc
